feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 10:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries ending late this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 60 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
